description: Form validation depends on form UI being built.
API integration depends on the validated form being complete.
E2E tests can only be written and executed once the feature is fully implemented.
mitigation_plan: QA can start writing test stubs in parallel with development.
impact_if_delayed: Release is blocked until tests pass.

description: Logout functionality requires a logged-in session to be established first.
Infinite scroll enhances the base feed component.
The admin route guard middleware protects the admin layout and its child routes.
